item.description:
Cost: $20 per person (9 holes)


Hello Everyone -

Fall is approaching which mean we're gonna move our Tuesday night golf games to Sundays at 4:00 as it's getting dark so much sooner ;-( Playing on Sunday should allow for us to try a number of different golf courses now since we don't have to account for everyone coming from work. It's up to you if you want to play 9 or 18 as we'll have plenty of time now. You decide!

See you on the course!!

Susan

Note:

Please check your email that afternoon for any cancellation from me.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Golf Anyone!!!
